snippet: Ben Sprecher, now clear of any suggestion he did anything untoward to cause the musical’s collapse, has begun to spell out how it could have happened.
abstract: Ben Sprecher, a producer of canceled Broadway musical Rebecca, begins to spell out how he was taken in by Mark C Hotton, who faces federal criminal fraud charges in perhaps the most audacious financing scheme ever to sink a Broadway show; Sprecher says he was so single-minded in his determination to bring Rebecca to Broadway that he did not allow himself to be distracted by the oddities of Hotton's proposals.

byline.original: By PATRICK HEALY and WILLIAM K. RASHBAUM

lead_paragraph: Ben Sprecher, now clear of any suggestion he did anything untoward to cause the musical’s collapse, has begun to spell out how it could have happened.

headline.seo: Ben Sprecher, ‘Rebecca’ Producer, Explains His Fallen Dream
headline.main: ‘Rebecca’ Producer Explains How Trust Betrayed His Dream of Manderley
